Tasks.Name: update existing makes
Tasks.Description: updates all existsing based on id makes regardless of last_updated_on
Tasks.Exec: update MOTH3.vehiclemanufacturer mm left join make m on mm.id=m.id set mm.name=m.name

Tasks.Name: add new makes
Tasks.Description: creates new vehicle in moth.vehicle database if does not exist in moth
Tasks.Exec: insert into MOTH3.vehiclemanufacturer (id, name) select make.id, make.name from make left outer join MOTH3.vehiclemanufacturer on make.id=MOTH3.vehiclemanufacturer.id where MOTH3.vehiclemanufacturer.id is NULL;

Tasks.Name: update vehicles
Tasks.Description: updates all vehicles which have changed since
ExecTab: inner join vehicle v on hv.id=v.id
left join fuel_type as f on v.fuel_type_id=f.id
left join colour_lookup as c on v.primary_colour_id=c.id
left join wheelplan_type as w on v.wheelplan_type_id=w.id
left join vehicle_v5c as v5c on v.id=v5c.vehicle_id
left join make as make on v.make_id=make.id
left join model as model on v.model_id=model.id

Tasks.Name: add new vehicles
ExecTab: (id, manufacturer_id,registration, model, vin, dateFirstUsed, fuelType, colour, wheelPlan, v5cReference, approvalType)
select v.id, v.make_id, v.registration, model.name, v.vin, v.first_used_date, f.name fuel_type, c.name colour, w.name wheel_plan, v5c.v5c_ref, 'approval_type'
from vehicle as v left join MOTH3.vehicle hv on hv.id=v.id
left join fuel_type as f on v.fuel_type_id=f.id
left join colour_lookup as c on v.primary_colour_id=c.id
left join wheelplan_type as w on v.wheelplan_type_id=w.id
left join vehicle_v5c as v5c on v.id=v5c.vehicle_id
left join make as make on v.make_id=make.id
left join model as model on v.model_id=model.id
where hv.id is null and v5c.last_seen is null;

Tasks.Name: update tests
Tasks.Description: updeate tests into moth.vehicle database if they exists
ExecTab: inner join mot_test t on ht.id=t.id
LEFT OUTER JOIN odometer_reading r ON r.id = t.odometer_reading_id
left JOIN site s ON t.site_id = s.id
LEFT OUTER JOIN site_contact_detail_map sm ON sm.site_id = s.id
LEFT OUTER  JOIN phone p ON sm.contact_detail_id = p.contact_detail_id AND p.is_primary = 1
mileageUnit=r.unit ,testNumber=t.number ,pass=t.status_id ,reasonForFailure='reasons for failure divided with new line' ,
advisoryNotice='advisory notice divided with new line' ,
vt20Reference=case when t.status_id=6 then t.number else '' end ,vt30Reference=case when t.status_id=5 then t.number else '' end ,

Tasks.Name: add tests
Tasks.Description: add tests into moth.vehicle database if does not exist
ExecTab: select t.id, t.vehicle_id,date(t.started_date),t.expiry_date,r.value,r.unit,t.number,t.status_id, 'reasons for failure divided with new line', 'advisory notice divided with new line',case when t.status_id=6 then t.number else '' end,case when t.status_id=5 then t.number else '' end, name,s.site_number,p.number
left join MOTH3.testresult ht on ht.id=t.id
